de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces

Interface IAttachment

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Attachment

    public interface IAttachment
    English:
    represents the attachments of the incoming mail or a generated document. The "Email" object contains attachments as a list.
    was:
    IAttachment.java
